content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Guten Tag, Herr Wang. Welcome to Duisburg. I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. So, what is your budget for the monthly rent?
(High value negotiation)
Herr Wang: I am willing to pay 650 Euro per month.
Peter Schmidt: I appreciate your offer, Herr Wang, but I was thinking more along the lines of 750 Euro per month. The apartment is newly built and located in the city center, close to all amenities.
Herr Wang: I understand, but 750 Euro is beyond my budget. Can we compromise at 700 Euro?
Peter Schmidt: Let's see... I can't go below 720 Euro, as it's a very convenient location and I need to recover my investment. Is that acceptable for you?
Herr Wang: I'll need to think about it. Can you offer any additional incentives to justify the higher rent?
Peter Schmidt: How about I provide a free spot in the nearby parking garage for your car? It usually costs an extra 50 Euro per month, but I'll include it for free if we agree on 720 Euro.
Herr Wang: That's a tempting offer. I'll need to discuss it with my family. 720 Euro it is then, including the parking spot.
Peter Schmidt: Excellent! I agree to the price of 720 Euro per month.
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
